title: Ep. 232 - Bad Faith Arguments Abound
description:
Today on the show, Joe Biden struggles to respect personal space. Is this a huge scandal we should care about? (No.) Also, a woman gives birth to her son’s child — we’ll look at the lengths people go to get around biology. Finally, should christians cite the Bible when they’re arguing about cultural issues with people who don't believe in the Bible? I say no, and I'll explain why. 04-04-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
